comments.comment:
Mama Dubai wela avurudu 11k wenawa.gedara bittj 4ta hira wela nam na.lamai ekka ona thanaka yanawa.podi lamayata mona hari ona unama lamaya ekka taxi eke gihin mage salli welata aran denawa.
Mn ahala tinne lankawe ganunta wada indonesia ganu natana nada gam gana.ewa nam as 2kta dakalath tinawa.mn hodin upades dila tinawa mata wada wayasaka ayata.kiyana de pili gatta kiyala agawanawa.at ona nathi un ekka yalukamata hari katha keranawa.ape gedara coffee bonna ena pakistan un mata wada hodata allapu gedara wada kariyo aduranawa.a unata un mage muna kelin balala katha keranne na.a un man kavuda kiyala danna nisa.mn gana un dannawa hodata gedra minissu kiyana nisa.
Me okkomagh hari indonesia ganu kerana waradi a ratawal wela minissu media wela mehema kata keranawa mn ahalath na dakalath na.ekata lankawe minissu koi taram tamnge ratata jathiyata lajja keranawada.

replies.replyComment: Aya hema genima nemeine kiyanne. A katawa eththa. Mokada  ape gemu kochcharanam me oman ake bangaliyoi pakkoi indin un akka yanawada. A aka kottasayak vitarai. Anika A gewal wala weda karana ayata wada gewal walin penala enna aya.. godak hoda aya ennawa. Eyala gewal wala weda karala niwadu dawasata kattiya akathu wela uwamana karana dewal aran oya park akakata hari ayalata nidahase enna puluwan tenaka edala aya weda karana gedarata hawasa yanawa. tawa gewal wala weda karana ara wage yana ayath ennawa. Akata etin taman hedenawa misak wena unta benalath wedak neh. Baninna oni genunta kalin genunwa rata ewala lankawe sepa vidina piriminta. Mokada un hoyanne neh genu rata yawala eyala monawa karanawada kiyala mokada acconut akata mase salli wetinawane.
